title: shim: refine set subreaper
body:
It's better to get rid of invoking "unsafe" libc function directly in `set_subreaper()` though we know it's quite safe in fact.

Signed-off-by: Zhang Tianyang <burning9699@gmail.com>

title: runc-shim: support shim cgroup and oom score
body: Signed-off-by: Zhang Tianyang <burning9699@gmail.com>

title: build(deps): bump actions/checkout from 2 to 3

labels.name: T-dependencies
labels.description: Pull requests that update a dependency file

labels.name: github_actions
labels.description: Pull requests that update GitHub Actions code

body:
Bumps [actions/checkout](https://github.com/actions/checkout) from 2 to 3.
Release notes

Sourced from actions/checkout's releases.

v3.0.0

  • Update default runtime to node16

v2.4.0

  • Convert SSH URLs like org-<ORG_ID>@github.com: to https://github.com/ - pr

v2.3.5

Update dependencies

v2.3.4

  • Add missing awaits
  • Swap to Environment Files

v2.3.3

  • Remove Unneeded commit information from build logs
  • Add Licensed to verify third party dependencies

v2.3.2

Add Third Party License Information to Dist Files

v2.3.1

Fix default branch resolution for .wiki and when using SSH

v2.3.0

Fallback to the default branch

v2.2.0

Fetch all history for all tags and branches when fetch-depth=0

v2.1.1

Changes to support GHES (here and here)

v2.1.0

  • Group output
  • Changes to support GHES alpha release
  • Persist core.sshCommand for submodules
  • Add support ssh
  • Convert submodule SSH URL to HTTPS, when not using SSH
  • Add submodule support
  • Follow proxy settings
  • Fix ref for pr closed event when a pr is merged
  • Fix issue checking detached when git less than 2.22
Changelog

Sourced from actions/checkout's changelog.

Changelog

v2.3.1

  • Fix default branch resolution for .wiki and when using SSH

v2.3.0

  • Fallback to the default branch

v2.2.0

  • Fetch all history for all tags and branches when fetch-depth=0

v2.1.1

  • Changes to support GHES (here and here)

v2.1.0

  • Group output
  • Changes to support GHES alpha release
  • Persist core.sshCommand for submodules
  • Add support ssh
  • Convert submodule SSH URL to HTTPS, when not using SSH
  • Add submodule support
  • Follow proxy settings
  • Fix ref for pr closed event when a pr is merged
  • Fix issue checking detached when git less than 2.22

v2.0.0

  • Do not pass cred on command line
  • Add input persist-credentials
  • Fallback to REST API to download repo
Commits
  • a12a394 update readme for v3 (#708)
  • 8f9e05e Update to node 16 (#689)
  • 230611d Change secret name for PAT to not start with GITHUB_ (#623)
  • See full diff in compare view

[![Dependabot compatibility score](https://dependabot-badges.githubapp.com/badges/compatibility_score?dependency-name=actions/checkout&package-manager=github_actions&previous-version=2&new-version=3)](https://docs.github.com/en/github/managing-security-vulnerabilities/about-dependabot-security-updates#about-compatibility-scores) Dependabot will resolve any conflicts with this PR as long as you don't alter it yourself. You can also trigger a rebase manually by commenting `@dependabot rebase`. [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-start) [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-end) ---

title: runc-shim: impl close io and pids task
body: Implements of close io and pids task.

title: runc: Set piped stdio as default
body:
Fix #44 
Signed-off-by: Zhang Tianyang <burning9699@gmail.com>

title: fixed msrv in README.md to 1.54
body:
fixed inconsistency between `README.md` and `rust-toolchain.toml`

Signed-off-by: Yuna Tomida <ytomida.mmm@gmail.com>

title: runc-shim: implement stats and update task
body: implement stats container task and update container task

title: Rework exit signals and task creation
body:
- `ExitSignal` is no longer `Arc`. Don't add extra overhead by default, its up to runtime implementations whether they need to count references. 
- Renames `get_task_service` to `create_task_service` to highlight that we expect task service to be created from there (and don't do clonable objects).
- Create `ShimTask` from `create_task_service` to avoid extra creation during `shim --start` call.
- Replaces `Arc<Mutex<Option<ShutdownType>>>` with `Once`. 

Signed-off-by: Maksym Pavlenko <pavlenko.maksym@gmail.com>

title: Bug fixes and improvements to the runc crate
body:
Bug fixes and improvements to the runc crate:
1) avoid unwrap() in launch()
2) fixes several bugs in command line preparation
3) refine the way to setup IO for runc.

title: runc: fix bug that exec command leaks files
body:
Fix bugs: Exec command will create a tmp file to store process spec json, this file should be removed after used otherwse it will be left on the host.

Signed-off-by: Zhang Tianyang <burning9699@gmail.com>

title: shim-proto: group common proto types into types
body:
Group generated soruce files for common protobuf source files into
src/types, also simplify the build.rs.

Signed-off-by: Liu Jiang <gerry@linux.alibaba.com>
Signed-off-by: Quanwei Zhou <quanweiZhou@linux.alibaba.com>

title: Remove runc dependency from shim crate
body:
Remove runc dependency from `shim` crate (move to `shim-runc` crate).

shim crate expected to be implementation independent.
(though i'm sure we could extract some parts back to `shim` in future)

PTAL @jiangliu @Burning1020 

Signed-off-by: Maksym Pavlenko <pavlenko.maksym@gmail.com>

title: support async for containerd-shim-protos
body:
there are 2 commits to support async for containerd-shim-protos
* commit 1:  shim-proto: support async
* commit 2: shim-proto: add async example

Fixes: #33
Signed-off-by: Quanwei Zhou <quanweiZhou@linux.alibaba.com>

title: IO follow up
body:
/cc @jiangliu 

Signed-off-by: Maksym Pavlenko <pavlenko.maksym@gmail.com>

title: shim-proto: avoid duplicated definition of Mount
body:
There are two copies of mount.rs generated from the same protobuf file,
so unify them into one copy.

Fixed: #23

Signed-off-by: Liu Jiang <gerry@linux.alibaba.com>

title: RFC: Refactor ConfigBuilder as GlobalOpts
body: Refactor ConfigBuilder as GlobalOpts to follow the runc man pages, and move all commandline parsing related code into options.rs.

title: Enhancements to the runc crate
body:
Enhancements to the runc crate
1) add unit test cases
2) add helpers to reduce duplicated code
3) avoid possible panic
4) refine inline documentation

title: [runc] Add async feature
body:
Add `async` feature to isolate dependencies.

This will allow to exclude unnecessary dependencies (like don't pull `tokio` if not using async rust)

Signed-off-by: Maksym Pavlenko <pavlenko.maksym@gmail.com>

title: shim: add inline doc for set_subreaper() and SOCKET_FD
body:
As follow-on work, add inline documentation for set_reapder(#19)
and SOCKET_FD (#20).

Signed-off-by: Liu Jiang <gerry@linux.alibaba.com>

title: Remove duplicated config builder
body:
In current implementation there are 2 duplicated config builders ([1](https://github.com/containerd/rust-extensions/blob/3b2b00f206a0191a5a7b12a8f4c735a36988c7cc/crates/runc/src/runc.rs#L75) and [2](https://github.com/containerd/rust-extensions/blob/3b2b00f206a0191a5a7b12a8f4c735a36988c7cc/crates/runc/src/lib.rs#L121))
This PR consolidates them into one `ConfigBuilder`.

Also adds documentation for runc's global options.

/cc: @Yuna-Tomi @Burning1020 

Signed-off-by: Maksym Pavlenko <pavlenko.maksym@gmail.com>

title: Minimum runc shim implementation
body:
Implement shim cli commands and some basic task APIs to run a runc container

Co-authored-by: Feng Shaobao <fshb1988@gmail.com>
Co-authored-by: Zhang Tianyang <burning9699@gmail.com>
Co-authored-by: Yu Qitao <yuqitao1024@qq.com>

Signed-off-by: Zhang Tianyang <burning9699@gmail.com>

title: runc client
body:
runc client 
Signed-off-by: Yuna Tomida <ytomida.mmm@gmail.com>

title: [shim] Fix socket binding address
body:
As there is no need in "-socket" flag, we'd better use SOCKET_FD as the binding address of task server only.

If "-socket" flag was passed as socket path by the first start command, the second default command will failed with "Address in use" error because the socket was already passed to it by Fd mapping when spawn command. 

Signed-off-by: Burning <burning9699@gmail.com>

title: [shim] Set the "child subreaper" attribute
body:
The shim process can have "child subreaper" attribute when arg2 is **nonzero**.
see: https://man7.org/linux/man-pages/man2/prctl.2.html

title: Update simple_logger requirement from 1.16 to 2.0

labels.name: T-dependencies
labels.description: Pull requests that update a dependency file

body:
Updates the requirements on [simple_logger](https://github.com/borntyping/rust-simple_logger) to permit the latest version.
Release notes

Sourced from simple_logger's releases.

2.0.0

https://crates.io/crates/simple_logger/2.0.0

Version 2.0.0 changes the default from displaying timestamps in the local timezone to displaying timestamps in UTC. See issue #52 for more information.

This also introduces a timestamp display option using a static UTC offset via .with_utc_offset(...). See examples/timestamps_utc_offset.rs for an example. Be wary of using this in any long lived environment where daylight savings and other timezone changes might matter.

Commits
  • 6b3bb6d Merge pull request #53 from borntyping/feature/2.0.0
  • ee4c93d Set required-features for examples
  • 8dad754 Add an example for Timezones::None
  • 63519f5 Add a timestamp option using a static UTC offset
  • 36f984e Make UTC the default timestamps option, and change the output format to inclu...
  • 90db900 Run actions on release
  • See full diff in compare view

title: shim: distinguish between runtime id and container id
body:
There's a misuse of runtime id and container id in Shim::new(). Both
runtime id and container id are needed by shim implentions, so add
parameter `container id` to Shim::new().

Fixes: #13

title: Update shim/README.md for running examples locally
body:
The README.md of shim crate is out-of-code, so update it.

And also fix a bug(the first commit) of passing the wrong container id to shim.

Now it depends on https://github.com/containerd/ttrpc-rust/pull/116 to let shim-client to use normal Unix domain socket.

title: [RFC] Bugfix and enhancements for crate containerd-shim
body:
This is an in-progress patch set for the containerd-shim crate, which 
1) fixes some resource leakage issues related to RawFd
2) adds more unit test cases
3) extends spawn() 
4) refine the Shim trait interfaces

title: Consolidate shim-proto from Alibaba runD into shim-client
body:
There's an ongoing efforts to upstream Alibaba's runD for Kata 3.0. There's a similar implementation of shim-client/shim-proto from runD. It would be great to consolidate these two implementations.

Fixes: #2
